Class CSVWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.Writer
      • java.io.BufferedWriter

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExportWriter, java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable, java.lang.Appendable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class CSVWriter
extends java.io.BufferedWriter
implements ExportWriter
    CSVWriter - util class for writing objects into CSV

      • getHeaderText

        public java.lang.String getHeaderText()
        Returns:
        String Description of exported data with commas appended to correspond to the number of columns being exported. Needed so it doesn't break applications which will be parsing this data.
